identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Negative Space. Contrast.

theme.strategy: Apple-style Minimalism 2.0. High clarity, soft shadows, glassmorphism.

dashboard.rules: Use col-span-2 for main charts, col-span-1 for stats. Asymmetry is key.

knowledge_base.hero: Centered, large typography, search bar dominant

accessibility.contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance. Use slate-600 for secondary text, never lighter.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.

instructions_to_main_agent: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to use the specified color palette and border radius.
Use 'Manrope' font from Google Fonts via 'next/font' or standard import.
Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard.
Ensure all cards use the glassmorphism effect defined in components.cards.
Do NOT use generic blue. Use the 'Electric Indigo' defined in colors.
For the Builder, use a 'Split View' layout with a floating toolbar.
Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and links.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-8, p-12).
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
